description:
Serious Legal Problems Require Serious Representation

At Barash & Everett LLC, our legal team combines experience and resources that have made us the go-to law firm in West Central Illinois. They possess the experience and knowledge that you need during life-changing times.

We are committed to sophisticated legal services on behalf of Galesburg residents and entrepreneurs that include:

  • Divorce
  • Business law
  • Criminal defense
  • Estate planning
  • Agricultural law

Experience. Expertise. Energy.

Our firm's history dates back to Burl Barash starting his legal practice in 1929. Today, our lawyers continue to make history and stay on the cutting edge with 21st-century energy and innovation. We have established a strong, longtime reputation in the legal community for high-level advocacy and client communications.

We are committed to value-added legal representation. You will have a skilled and seasoned advocate at your side who welcomes the challenge and overcomes the obstacles. You will not retain a lesser-experienced attorney who is paid for "on-the-job" training.

Once we take on your case, we will navigate you through a complex legal process. Regardless of how we find resolution to your case, we focus on the best possible outcome.
